values.value: YEAR R - MUST BE IN THE RANGE OF 2010 TO PRESENT
YEAR S - MUST BE IN THE RANGE OF 2020 TO PRESENT
YEAR T - MUST BE IN THE RANGE OF 2030 TO PRESENT
YEAR U - MUST BE IN THE RANGE OF 2040 TO PRESENT
YEAR V - MUST BE IN THE RANGE OF 2050 TO PRESENT
INITIALS - CANNOT BE I, O, Q, U, V, X, Y, Z
PLACEMENT - MUST BE L FOR LEFT CUFF OR P FOR POCKET
PLACEMENT - MUST BE L FOR LEFT SIDE OR R FOR RIGHT SIDE
PLACEMENT - L=LEFT SIDE; R=RIGHT SIDE; P=POCKET; C=COLLAR
PLACEMENT - L=LEFT SIDE; R=RIGHT SIDE; B=BOTH SIDES
PLACEMENT - MUST BE P FOR POCKET
BIRTHSTONE - UP TO 4 MO ABBREV/SEPARATE BY SPACE (JAN FEB MAR APR )
LETTER STYLE - MUST BE 1, 2 OR 3 (DRESS SHIRTS)
LETTER STYLE - MUST BE 1 OR 2 (MENS ROBES)
LETTER STYLE - MUST BE 4 OR 5 (WOMENS ROBES)
LETTER STYLE - MUST BE 1 THRU 7 (ALL VALID STYLES)
THREAD COLOR - MUST BE W (WHITE) OR N (NAVY)
THREAD COLOR - MUST BE W (WHITE) OR N (NAVY) OR C (COMPLIMENTARY)
PERSONALIZATION TYPE - MUST BE 2 (ROBES ï¿½ PERSONALIZED
NO CHECKS - NO EDIT RULES APPLY BUT SHOULD BE MANUALLY REVIEWED
BIRTHSTONE - MUST BE THREE CHARACTER MONTH ABBREV (IE. JAN)
THREAD COLOR - MUST BE W(WHITE), N(NAVY), G(GOLD), C(COMPLIMENTARY)
THREAD COLOR - A, B, D, E, G, H, I, J, K, N, R, W OR Y
THREAD COLOR - A, B, D, E, G, H, I, J, K, M, N, O, R, W OR Y
BIRTHSTONES - UP TO 20 SINGLE ALPHA CHARACTERS (A TO L) FOR MONTH
PLACEMENTS - L=LEFT CUFF; R=RIGHT CUFF; P=POCKET; C=COLLAR
MUST BE IN MM-DD-YY OR MM/DD/YY DATE FORMAT
METAL - G=YELLOW GOLD; W=WHITE GOLD; P=PLATINUM
NO CHECKS - NO EDIT RULES APPLY TO THE INPUT FIELD
MIN-MAX WIDTH(LENGTH) - REQUIRES MIN-MAX WIDTH OR LENGTH FOR SETUP
OPTIONAL - INPUT FIELD DOES NOT REQUIRE ENTRY BY THE CSR
BIRTHSTONE - MUST CONTAIN TWO-DIGIT MONTH AND ABBREVIATION (01JAN)
STONE ARRANGEMENT - MUST CONTAIN EITHER A Y FOR YES OR N FOR NO
PLACEMENT - MUST BE L FOR LEFT CUFF, R FOR RIGHT CUFF, OR P FOR POCKET
CONTROLS - MUST BE L FOR LEFT OR R FOR RIGHT
CASING - MUST BE I FOR INSIDE OR O FOR OUTSIDE
DRAW - MUST BE C FOR CENTER OR O FOR ONE-WAY
PANEL - MUST BE P FOR PAIR OR S FOR SINGLE
STACK - MUST BE L FOR LEFT OR R FOR RIGHT
EIGHTH FRACTIONS - MUST BE 1/8, 1/4, 3/8, 1/2, 5/8, 3/4, OR 7/8 ONLY
FOURTH FRACTIONS - MUST BE 1/4, 1/2, OR 3/4 ONLY
YEAR, 4 DIGIT - MUST BE IN YYYY FORMAT, SUCH AS 1990
YEAR, 2 DIGIT - MUST BE IN YY FORMAT, LAST 2 DIGITS OF YEAR (91)
MONTH - MUST BE IN MM FORMAT AND VALID MONTH NUMBER
DAY - MUST BE IN DD FORMAT AND VALID DAY NUMBER
INITIALS - CANNOT BE ONE OF THE FOLLOWING O, Q, U, X, Y OR Z
CAR DOORS - MUST BE 2 FOR 2-DOOR OR 4 FOR 4-DOOR
BODY STYLE - S=SEDAN, H=HARDTOP, C=CONVERTIBLE, W=WAGON, P=PICKUP
CONSOLE - MUST BE C FOR WITH CONSOLE OR W FOR WITHOUT CONSOLE
SEAT - MUST BE S FOR STANDARD OR B FOR BUCKET
TRANSMISSION - MUST BE A FOR AUTO OR S FOR STANDARD
COLUMN/FLOOR - MUST BE C FOR COLUMN OR F FOR FLOOR
DRIVE - MUST BE 2 FOR 2-WHEEL DRIVE OR 4 FOR 4-WHEEL DRIVE
DECADES - MUST BE DECADE OF 00, 10, 20, 30, 40, 50, 60, 70, 80, OR 90
YEAR A - MUST BE IN THE RANGE OF 1897 TO 1915
YEAR B - MUST BE IN THE RANGE OF 1934 TO 1964
YEAR C - MUST BE IN THE RANGE OF 1946 TO 1965
YEAR D - MUST BE IN THE RANGE OF 1965 TO 1969
YEAR E - MUST BE IN THE RANGE OF 1971 TO 1984
YEAR F - MUST BE IN THE RANGE OF 1800 TO PRESENT
YEAR G - MUST BE IN THE RANGE OF 1900 TO PRESENT
NUMERIC - MUST CONTAIN A NUMERIC VALUE ONLY
ALPHABETIC - MUST CONTAIN ALPHA CHARACTERS ONLY
MMDDYY - MUST BE IN DATE FORMAT MMDDYY
YEAR H - MUST BE IN THE RANGE OF 1910 TO PRESENT
YEAR I - MUST BE IN THE RANGE OF 1920 TO PRESENT
YEAR J - MUST BE IN THE RANGE OF 1930 TO PRESENT
YEAR K - MUST BE IN THE RANGE OF 1940 TO PRESENT
YEAR L - MUST BE IN THE RANGE OF 1950 TO PRESENT
YEAR M - MUST BE IN THE RANGE OF 1960 TO PRESENT
YEAR N - MUST BE IN THE RANGE OF 1970 TO PRESENT
YEAR O - MUST BE IN THE RANGE OF 1980 TO PRESENT
YEAR P - MUST BE IN THE RANGE OF 1990 TO PRESENT
YEAR Q - MUST BE IN THE RANGE OF 2000 TO PRESENT
